## Cartesian2dInteractionHandler class

Default interaction handler for cartesian 2d. Allows panning, zooming with mouse and touch events like pinch zoom. Ranges are restricted to avoid float precision issues, see [Cartesian2dFloatPrecisionRangeBounder](./cartesian-2d.cartesian2dfloatprecisionrangebounder.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Cartesian2dInteractionHandler<TTraits> implements IInteractionStateChangeCallbacks<TTraits> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IInteractionStateChangeCallbacks](./core.iinteractionstatechangecallbacks.md)<!-- -->&lt;TTraits&gt;
